H0.text: Which organisation awards the Dickin Medal. Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA)

H1.text: Which organisation awards the Dickin Medal. International Fund for Animal Welfare (IFAW)

H2.text: Which organisation awards the Dickin Medal. Blue Cross

H3.text: Which organisation awards the Dickin Medal. PDSA

A4.text: The PDSA Dickin Medal was instituted in 1943 by Maria Dickin to honour the work of animals in World War II.
